title: Rivers of London: Cry Fox #2
description: The bookstore smash-hit returns for a brand-new story, picking up the threads from the most recent bestselling Rivers of London novel, The Hanging Tree.n“Plenty of action and intrigue, with a splash of dry humor and witchcraft.” – Word of the Nerdn“It’s engaging, thrilling and has just enough of that real world work spliced with the magic/supernatural elements to make plausible and fantastical at the same time.” – Reading with a Flight Ring.n“9 out of 10” – Graphic Policy
author: Ben Aaronovitch
